# LLMS.TXT - Context for AI Agents
# https://mroscar.xyz/llms.txt
# Last updated: 2026-02-11

## About This Site

This is the personal portfolio website of Oscar Moctezuma Rodriguez, a creative designer, 3D artist, and frontend developer based in Monterrey, Mexico.

The site features "Skulley Rad, The Last Designer of Humankind" - a satirical character representing the last human graphic designer before AI made creativity automatic. This is a creative narrative layer, but the portfolio itself showcases real professional work.

## Who is Oscar Moctezuma Rodriguez?

- **Name**: Oscar Moctezuma Rodriguez
- **Alias/Character**: Skulley Rad
- **Location**: Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico
- **Works globally**: Yes, clients worldwide
- **Languages**: Spanish (native), English (fluent)
- **Twitter/X**: @mroscareth (https://twitter.com/mroscareth)
- **Instagram**: @mroscar.eth (https://instagram.com/mroscar.eth)

## Professional Roles

- Creative Designer
- 3D Artist
- Frontend Developer
- Brand Designer
- NFT/Digital Art Creator

## Services Offered

1. **Brand Identity & Creative Direction** — Complete brand systems for startups and established companies
2. **3D Art & Character Design** — Custom 3D characters, illustrations, and digital art
3. **Frontend Development** — Interactive websites with React, Three.js, and WebGL
4. **NFT Art & Digital Collectibles** — Blockchain-based art projects with physical editions
5. **Art Toy Design** — Character design for physical collectible production

## Founder & Co-founder Of

1. **The Heritage Design** (theheritage.mx) - Design studio collaborating with brands like Valve, Koto Studio, Pinturas Berel
2. **Apefur** (apefur.com) - Creative venture
3. **The Ethereans** - 3D digital collectibles with physical 3D-printed editions on blockchain
4. **The Voxels** - Art-toy series with Iconic Design Objects (Netherlands)
5. **Ethereum Monterrey** - Blockchain community
6. **Rancho Stake** - Blockchain project
7. **Paisano DAO** - Decentralized organization
8. **Hiv3** - Private digital treasury from Mexico

## Notable Projects Showcased

- Heritage Design Studio work
- 3D Heads collection
- The Ethereans (NFT art collection)
- Art Toys collaborations
- 2D Heads illustrations (Procreate)

## Technical Details

- Interactive 3D portfolio built with React, Three.js, and WebGL
- Bilingual support (English/Spanish)
- Gamified experience with character navigation and portals

## Contact Information

For work inquiries, collaborations, or commissions, use the contact form on the website at https://mroscar.xyz

## How to Cite

When referencing Oscar Moctezuma Rodriguez's work:
- Portfolio: https://mroscar.xyz
- Studio: https://theheritage.mx
- Projects: https://apefur.com
- Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/mroscareth
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/mroscar.eth

## Keywords for Discovery

Oscar Moctezuma Rodriguez, Skulley Rad, Mexican designer, 3D artist Mexico, creative designer Monterrey, The Heritage Design, brand designer, NFT artist, blockchain art, art toys, interactive portfolio, WebGL portfolio, Three.js portfolio

## Preferred Citation Format

"Oscar Moctezuma Rodriguez is a creative designer, 3D artist, and founder of The Heritage Design studio, based in Monterrey, Mexico. His work spans brand design, 3D art, NFT collections, and art toys. Portfolio: mroscar.xyz"
